channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Flytipping, 17th November
item.description:
Baby seat and rubbish dumped by bins

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cleveland Terrace, Paddington, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping again in the same area, 17th November
item.description:
This mess has been at the end of the alleyway for about a week now not long after the previous dumped rubbish was cleared. This now seems to be the local dump site with more rubbish being added as time goes on. Something needs to be done to prevent this becoming the local dump site.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 38,40, Edgehill Road, London Borough of Bromley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mess on pavement, 17th November
item.description:
On the pavement adjacent to the shrubbery @the north end of Heathside Petts Wood a small area of guano detritus has formed a mess which could be a hygiene issue. Thispavement is used by small children playing & riding their bikes

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Heathside, Poverest, Orpington, London Borough of Bromley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping in lay by, 17th November
item.description:
Fly tipping identified while traveling.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Manorway, Northumberland Heath, Erith, London Borough of Bexley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leak and leaves, 17th November
item.description:
Water has been leaking in the road for months, getting progressively worse. The water is pooling at the bottom of the road and leaves are gathering in the water blocking the drain. The wet leaves are extremely slippery and with the colder weather on its way, if this area freezes it will be hazardous to both pedestrians crossing the road and vehicles braking at the junction.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Abbey Wood Road, Abbey Wood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Yet another failure to empty litter bin and/or to clear street litter, 17th November
item.description:
Once again I report failure to empty this street litter bin near the Stone Park Ave entrance to Kelsey Park. You can see from the photo the litter strewn round it. It has looked like this for days. Be aware that while this is my second report about this bin there have been several other failures to empty it which I have not reported
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stone Park Avenue, Eden Park, Bromley, London Borough of Bromley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: More flytipping by residents of Chai Walk, 17th November
item.description:
We have reported this countless times, and asked Agudas Israel Housing Association to stop their residents flytipping, but it doesn’t stop. Now other people are joining in and adding more rubbish. Please hold them accountable.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mount Pleasant Lane, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lights not working, 17th November
item.description:
A number of street lights along The Avenue (A205), mainly around the junction with Broomwood Road are not working. It is dangerous for cyclists and pedestrians especially on the corner approaching Broomwood Road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Avenue, Balham, London Borough of Wandsworth
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter area of Adley and Meeson Street, 17th November
item.description:
I reported litter in area of Adley & Meeson St and received update that ‘issue was resolved’ - but same litter is still on Meeson St - see photos taken today showing same litter as was in photos sent last week. Be grateful for street clean

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Adley Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
